lines: 1. Teko Nyasaye orita,Abed ng`at Yesu chuth;Abed maler e pinynikaluwo ndach Yesu.
Teko Nyasaye orita;Ruoth, apodho nyimi;Ok an gimoro chutho,chutho, In ngimana duto.
2. Teko Nyasaye orita,Atim gi modwaro;Abed ng`ate malong`o,Moikre ni tich Ruoth.
3. Teko Nyasaye orita,Apogra chuth kod piny;Abed gi chuny mar Yesu-mamuol, mang`won, maler.
4. Teko Nyasaye orita,Abed ng`ate kende;Abed ng`at Yesu koro,Kendo ma nyaka chieng`.
